items.sentence: You didn't really expect Tom to understand that, did you?
The world is a grand ball in which everyone wears a mask.
I thought that I was the one who was supposed to do that.
Tom wasn't the only one laughing. Mary was laughing, too.
Frankly speaking, I don't even know what that word means.
I still have some things I need to do before I can leave.
You don't see many people in this park this time of year.
Tom has made friends with people from all over the world.
Mary showed Tom the diamond ring that John had given her.
Mary knew that Tom had a girlfriend, but she didn't care.
